article.title: Caudle Assigned to U.S. Naval Forces Europe-6th Fleet
article.text: Rear Adm. Daryl L. Caudle, USN, will be assigned as director, plans and operations, U.S. Naval Forces Europe-6th Fleet; deputy commander, U.S. 6th Fleet; commander, Submarines, Allied Naval Forces South; and commander, Submarine Group 8, Naples, Italy.
